Question
========

Of a number of children, age was determined in months, and height in centimeters. The data are plotted in the attached scatterplot._____. In this sample, the child with the greatest height had an age (in months) of:

![](uva-scatterplot-1269-en-graph01.png)

Answerlist
----------

* 18
* 28
* 29
* 87.4

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 18: Incorrect
* 28: Correct
* 29: Incorrect
* 87.4: Incorrect
